snippet.title: Mecha - Teaser
snippet.description:
Watch the teaser of our next game, Mecha!

Mecha is a 3D puzzle platformer that follows Coni’s journey to find and fix her errant creations. Along the way, she learns the importance of accepting the challenges she faces and finding greater purpose!

Wishlist now : https://store.steampowered.com/app/3359470

#PuzzlePlatformer #AccessibleGaming #SelfAcceptance #DisabilityRepresentation 

Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/ShishiStudios
Twitter : https://twitter.com/ShishiStudios
Discord : https://discord.gg/SAJ5kUx
